name: perundhu-improvements
description: Additional dependencies for performance and UX improvements
installation_command: npm install @tanstack/react-query@^5.59.0 @tanstack/react-query-devtools@^5.59.0 react-window@^1.8.10 react-intersection-observer@^9.13.1 workbox-core@^7.1.0 workbox-precaching@^7.1.0 workbox-routing@^7.1.0 workbox-strategies@^7.1.0 && npm install -D @types/react-window@^1.8.8
